extendedInfo.description: The most addictive block game 'Block Babara' is back!!!'Block Babara 2' is a arcade puzzle game that moves and stacks the coming down blocks with the same color vertically together. Sometimes, germ infected block is appeared and disturb your play but girl friend will help you (but not always [:)])Let's play 'Block Babara 2'! Go! Go!* You can save the game when pressing your phone's Cancel key during game play.[How To Play]* Blocks are coming down little by little.* Touch a lane to select the block and touch the other lane to move it.* Blocks disappear when three or more blocks with the same colors are stacked vertically together.* As you go higher levels, the blocks will be falling faster. Blocks of new color will be added as you reach specific levels.* You can down the more blocks by the down arrow button in game screen.* You can hold and use the item block by the button 'Hold Item'.* Sometimes, germ infected block is appeared. If you don't remove this block within 10 seconds, it will be disturb your play.* Girl friend block is also appeared. if you don't remove this block within 10 seconds, it will give an item to you. But the item is not always good for you.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: It is so nice game. Online challenge make game more exiting.
reviews.author: Mehul Gupta
